name: Group 55 Marketing
description:
A privately held, woman owned corporation. We create fresh, smart marketing in partnership with our clients, focusing on each organization’s unique values, mission and goals.
We can help you launch your product, build your brand, and effectively use both digital and traditional marketing techniques to get your message out and interact with your customers.Our solutions are built on research and sound strategy, leveraging our experience coupled with your knowledge of your product and market.
